innhold.avsnitt: Are you employed? In this case, you must apply using the Norwegian Labour Inspection Authority’s form “Omplassering/tilrettelegging pga. graviditet” [Relocation / special arrangements due to pregnancy] (no. 474 b). Your doctor or midwife must fill in his/her part of the form. Take the form to your employer before sending it to NAV.
Are you self-employed or freelance? The form for self-employed people and freelancers can be found here:
Requirements regarding pregnancy benefit for self-employed people and freelancers
